name: alphabet

B1 a set of letters arranged in a fixed order, used for writing a language: the Roman/Cyrillic alphabet
More examplesFewer examplesOn the road signs, the Greek place names have been transliterated into the Latin alphabet.Z comes after Y in the alphabet.The ninth letter of the alphabet is I.The letters had been placed in organized piles, one for each letter of the alphabet.Transcribing the Ethiopian text into the English alphabet was their first task.
